description: Nowadays Low Poly and Flat are in trend. Studying this video course you will learn that the low poly modeling is not just the very simple thing but also the fun. The author will gladly teach you to simulate models using extrusion technologies (Extrude and Extrude Inner)at first, and then he will teach you the basics of animation in Cinema 4D. In the end by composing and animating the models we will get the scene and effectively will bring it to perfection in the After Effects composite. You will acquire all the knowledge and will begin to use them in work immediately.
title: Low Poly modeling and animation in Cinema 4D
